example.eg: The bank worker is standing behind the counter.
example.egtrans: 银行工作人员正站在柜台后面。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…的后面, 在…的背后

example.eg: Much of Africa lags behind the West in economic terms.
example.egtrans: 非洲很多地方经济上落后于西方。

example.eg: I recognise the boys in the front row of the photo, but who are the two standing behind?
example.egtrans: 我认出了照片里前排的男孩子，不过站在后面的两位是谁？

example.eg: The father gave his disobedient son a swift kick in the behind.
example.egtrans: 父亲飞起一脚，踢在不听话的儿子屁股上。

example.eg: The train is two hours behind.
example.egtrans: 这趟火车晚点了两小时。

example.eg: Do not fall behind in your credit card payments.
example.egtrans: 不要拖欠偿付你的信用卡。

example.eg: The captain stayed behind as the others left the sinking ship.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 留在后面, 留到最后

example.eg: Chicago is one hour behind New York.
example.egtrans: 芝加哥的时间比纽约晚一个小时。

example.eg: If you feel you need a career change, I'm behind you 100%.
example.egtrans: 如果你觉得想要换个工作，我会在你背后100%地支持你。

example.eg: The government suspects that terrorists are behind the attacks.
example.egtrans: 政府怀疑这些袭击的幕后黑手是恐怖分子。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…的幕后, 是…的潜在原因

example.eg: Those difficult times are behind us now.
example.egtrans: 那些困难时期现在都已成为过去。

example.eg: Smith is behind Waxman and trying hard to catch up.
example.egtrans: 史密斯落后于韦克斯曼，正努力迎头赶上。

example.eg: Towards the end of the race, Stacey was becoming tired and started dropping back.
Our son has dropped behind at school, so he has to repeat a year.
If I don't study for two hours every night, I risk falling behind with my class work.
example.egtrans: 如果每晚不学习两个小时，我就有可能会落下课业。

example.eg: The runner started falling behind when he twisted his ankle two miles into the race.
example.egtrans: 在跑了两英里后，赛跑者扭伤了脚踝，开始落后了。

example.eg: If you promise not to change your mind, I'll get behind your efforts to clean up the park.
example.egtrans: 如果你保证不改变主意，我会支持你清理公园的活动。

example.eg: His friends, who were all hiding behind the door, leaped out and shouted "Surprise!"
She always hid behind her intellect so as not to show her emotional vulnerability.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以...为借口, 假借...之名

example.eg: It wasn't until I got to the airport that I found I had left my passport behind.
The sprinter from Nigeria left all the other runners behind.
From a very early age, Joseph has always left his peers behind.
Brian has a good job now and has left his days of poverty behind him.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 摆脱, 逃脱, 逃离

example.eg: Jane woke up late and is running behind.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 迟到, 晚点, 晚到

example.eg: You go on ahead; I'll stay behind.
example.egtrans: 你继续向前，我留下来断后。

example.eg: I hope he stays behind bars for the rest of his life!
The committee held the meeting behind closed doors.
They appear to have a happy marriage, but who knows what goes on behind the curtain.

dsense.name: behind the eight ball, behind the eightball

example.eg: The university is behind the eight ball when it comes to attracting international students.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 处于困境, 处于不利地位

example.eg: Mike was waiting behind the scenes to come on stage.
Cabinet ministers are involved in discussions behind the scenes about future spending plans.
While the company's products were exceptional in quality, its marketing had fallen behind the times.
She often told lies about him behind his back.

dsense.name: come from behind
dsense.guideword: (sports: win from a lagging position) (体育)

example.eg: He overtook the leader in the last lap to come from behind to win.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 迎头赶上, 后来居上
后来居上的, 逆转比分的

example.eg: Seeing his pursuers, the thief dodged behind a wall to get out of sight.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 躲闪到...后面, 闪避到...后面

example.eg: To avoid saying hello, he ducked under a desk.
example.egtrans: 不想打招呼的他躲进了桌子下面。

dsense.name: get behind with [sth], get behind on [sth]

example.eg: Dan's car was repossessed when he got behind on the payments.
example.egtrans: 丹拖欠贷款后，他的车被收回。//这些订单已经迟延了，因此我们不得不加班来赶进度。

example.eg: Fit and experienced hikers should stay at the back of the group to ensure no-one gets left behind.
example.egtrans: 身体矫健和经验丰富的徒步旅行者应该留在队伍后面，确保没人掉队。

example.eg: I got left behind when the Digital Revolution started.
example.egtrans: 数字革命开始后，我没有很快适应。

example.eg: Hurry up and get on the bus or you'll get left behind!
example.egtrans: 快点上车，不然你会被抛下的！

example.eg: Don't go behind her back; if you think she's wrong, tell her directly.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 背着某人, 在某人不知情的情况下

example.eg: Jim was lagging behind while the other runners were approaching the finishing line.
Clarkson was lagging behind the leading group of cyclists.
In terms of technological innovation, the company was lagging behind.
In the economic recovery, manufacturing is lagging behind other sectors.
The "Home Alone" movies are about a boy who is left behind when his family goes on vacation.
example.egtrans: 系列电影《小鬼当家》讲述的是由于家人外出度假而被留下的小男孩的故事。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 被舍弃的, 被抛弃的, 被留下的

example.eg: He couldn't explain the reason behind his actions.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 背后的原因, 真正的原因

example.eg: I was standing behind a really tall guy as the carnival floats went past, so I couldn't see a thing!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 站在...后面, 站在...后排

example.eg: Polly's father said he'd tan her backside if she was late home again.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 狠狠揍…一顿, 痛打…一顿

example.eg: The parents were deep in conversation and didn't seem to notice their child was trailing behind.
On their walk, the older dog trailed behind the younger dog.
The teacher was concerned about one student, who seemed to be trailing behind.
This company is trailing behind its competitors; its products just aren't as popular.
That's a laugh, you, trying to give me advice about women when you are still wet behind the ears.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 乳臭未干, 缺乏经验, 少不更事
